Recipe - Class in Unnamed Package
An abstract class representing a Recipe It allows: - Adding/removing recipes - Scaling ingredients - Calculating the difficulty and highest rating - Printing the recipe details Specific recipes(hot/cold)
Recipe(String, double) - Constructor for class Recipe
Creates a new Recipe with a given title and servings
RecipeAdder - Class in Unnamed Package
Automatically creates a recipe and adds it to a RecipeBook.
RecipeAdder(RecipeBook) - Constructor for class RecipeAdder
Constructor links this RecipeAdder to a specific RecipeBook.

Represents a recipe book containing multiple recipes

RecipeCold - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a cold recipe that needs chilling before eating Extends the Recipe class and adds chill time in minutes
RecipeCold(String, double) - Constructor for class RecipeCold
Creates a new cold recipe with a title and number of servings A second constructor which doesn't ask the user to input a cooking time unless they know it
RecipeCold(String, double, int) - Constructor for class RecipeCold
Creates a new cold recipe with a title, number of servings and chill time
